text: Summer Is Over () is a 1963 Soviet comedy film directed by Nikita Orlov and Rolan Bykov.6 советских фильмов, которые нужно посмотреть с детьми на каникулахВ кинотеатре «Берёзка» продолжается проект «Книга на экране»БЕЗ ПОСРЕДНИКОВ == Plot == The film tells about two schoolchildren who decided to spend the summer in the village. One of them throws the other in hopes of participating in the expedition, but as a result of the second one they expect more exciting adventures.Пропало лето == Cast == * Volodya Yevstafyev as Zheka Ruchkin * Seryozha Gudko as Valeriy Bulyshev * Zoya Fyodorova as Aunt Dasha * Antonina Dmitrieva as Aunt Masha * Lyudmila Chernyshyova as Aunt Sasha * Aleksandr Lebedev as militsiaman Muravey * Yakov Lents as Head of the post office / Bridge worker * Mikhail Pugovkin as Chief forwarderПропало лето (1964) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1963 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet comedy films Category:Soviet films
title: Summer Is Over (film)
